channel.title: Calculation on Dripping Data

item.title: Economical Iced Coffee
item.description: My wife and I like iced coffee but drinking it at Starbucks is expensive. I’ve been making it myself at home and it’s a reasonable facsimile at what I think is a much lower price. I decided to run the calculations to see how much we’re saving. Grounds I tried a bunch of different coffees to see what would work the best: whole bean Kirkland (Costco) brand, whole bean Kona coffee, ground Lion coffee (a local brand), ground Folgers, and ground Kirkland.
